      • convertToLists

        private java.util.List<double[]> convertToLists()
        Convert the list of Scores to a list of double arrays that can be fed to the GUI's score graphs
        Returns:
        return a list of double arrays formatted as followed : {generations, averages, maxValues, minValues}

      • dispatchLoadEvent

        public void dispatchLoadEvent(java.lang.String file)
        Notify the simulation that it need to be loaded from a file Can be called from another thread, the reload will be executed by the main thread. This is needed because the OpenGL context is only loaded in the main thread and is required to regenerate the world model
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be loaded from

      • dispatchSaveEvent

        public void dispatchSaveEvent(java.lang.String file)
        Notify the simulation that it need to be saved to a file Can be called from another thread, the save will be executed by the main thread. this methods exist only for the sake of symmetry with the loading mechanic
        Parameters:
        file - the file to save to

      • dispatchLoadWorldEvent

        public void dispatchLoadWorldEvent(java.lang.String file)
        Notify the simulation that it need to load a world from a file Can be called from another thread, the reload will be executed by the main thread. This is needed because the OpenGL context is only loaded in the main thread and is required to regenerate the world model
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be loaded from

      • dispatchSaveWorldEvent

        public void dispatchSaveWorldEvent(java.lang.String file)
        Notify the simulation that it need to save its world to a file Can be called from another thread, the save will be executed by the main thread. this methods exist only for the sake of symmetry with the loading mechanic
        Parameters:
        file - the file to save to

      • dispatchNewGenerationEvent

        public void dispatchNewGenerationEvent()
        Notify the simulation that it need pass to the next generation Can be called from another thread
